Detailed Description

Offers a hex mode line.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

wxExHexModeLine::wxExHexModeLine ( wxExSTC *  stc)

Constructor.

Uses current position and line.

int  pos_or_offset,
bool  is_position = true 
)

Constructor.

Specify position or byte offset. Default assumes you specify a position.

Member Function Documentation

const wxString wxExHexModeLine::GetInfo ( ) const

Returns info about current index, depending on which field is current.

bool wxExHexModeLine::Goto ( ) const

Goes to position in stc component as implied by current line and index.

bool wxExHexModeLine::IsReadOnly ( ) const

Returns true if current index refers to a readonly position in current line.

(as in the offset field, or on a space).

int wxExHexModeLine::OtherField ( ) const

If on ascii field, return index for hex field, if on hex field, return index for ascii field, if on offset field or invalid field, returns wxSTC_INVALID_POSITION.

bool wxExHexModeLine::Replace ( const wxUniChar &  c)

Replaces current line at current index with char for both ascii and hex field.

Also updates the hex buffer from stc.
